content: Might I get a review on #29058? It "upstreams" the type alias docs#Finset.Colex and turns it into an alias for arbitrary types, just like docs#Lex. The idea is to later add order instances on Colex (α → β) and Colex (α →₀ β) (with the latter being relevant to me in the context of the Cantor normal form and nimber arithmetic)
Bumping this again, it's blocking quite a lot of further work.
Why do you not define your new Colex as a structure as in the original case?
